content.name: Research Overhaul
content.description: A completely overhauled research: each research now requires more time as well as resources.
content.author: Harlockin

text.name: Research Overhaul
text.description: Полный пересмотр исследований: каждое исследование требует ресурсов и занимает больше времени
text.author: Harlockin

text.name: Amélioration des recherches
text.description: Un refonte du système de recherche : les recherches requierts des marchandises et sont beaucoup plus longues
text.author: Harlockin

text.name: Research Overhaul
text.description: Una completa rivisitazione del ramo Ricerca: ora ogni ricerca richiede molto più tempo così come risorse.
text.author: Harlockin
